title: DONALD TRUMP 2016
body: How does it feel to know Donald Trump will be president of the USA?

replies.body:
Why is this the place to talk about it?

For one this is a gaming forum with no connection to politics.
Secondly this is a gaming forum of mostly Australians and New Zealanders.

If Trump wins he will have little to no effect on us, therefore we have no reason to care.

"GENERAL DISCUSSION"

it doesn't have to be league related, only no life bozo's relate everything to this game

It used to say in the rules that the thread had to have some relation to the game.

And considering these are forums specifically dedicated to the game, there are BETTER forums for political discussions, especially ones that have no relation to the region at hand.

>It **used** to say in the rules that the thread had to have some relation to the game.

Used as in past tense and no longer applicable
Oh hey look, HeartVine confirmed it still does mean no religion, sex, politics and social issues.

Dronald Dump isn't even related to politics, he is just a douche on the side. 

Now seeing as America doesn't have Obama in office anymore... Can we take him in, would keep people like Abbott out and make our country even greater.

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MsRKusnp,comment-id=000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-11T04:07:09.416+0000)

> Now seeing as America doesn't have Obama in office anymore... Can we take him in, would keep people like Abbott out and make our country even greater.

stop sucking obamas dick, he wasn't that great. he was a mediocre president.
if you want to make this country great either vote labor or greens.

There was nothing wrong with Obama. In fact he's the best President they've had in a long time.
It was the system in place that made him fail.
In USA you vote for the president and then the party.
But the majority of Americans forget that or are too lazy to cast their vote months later for the ruling party.

Since the party in power were the opposition to Obama, they made it extremely difficult for him to actually have any power as a President. It's amazing he managed to do anything at all.

The equivalent here would be voting in Kevin Rudd, but the party voted in with him would be the Liberal Party.

A humanitarian with nothing but conservatives as "supports" ends up looking like nothing but trash, same in reverse.

Obama is the closest thing this world has had to a good "Leader" in generations.

Didn't stuff up something major.

The American dollar rose due to the Awesome aura Obama radiated, if we get him, our dollar will rise once more, due to that sheer awesome. 

巴拉克 奥巴马 for pm
Considering last I checked to be PM here you need to be like a third gen Australian, I doubt we can have Obama.
Abbott and Gillard weren't even born in Australia... Only difference is that Obama isn't an idiot like those 2
Check again retard, Tony Abbott and Julia Gillard were both born overseas

Actually, it kinda still does. All you need to do is look at the left side of the page at the section titled "Guidelines" (under the links to all the different sections of the boards) and it says "Mostly, that means stay away from stuff like religion, sex, politics, and social issues"

Some SJW nerd moderator removed my explanation but here it is: If donald trump nukes your pansy arse into oblivion you can't play league of legends. There's your link. Go and cry somewhere else. You're probably a Bernie Sanders supporter.

Nuke Australia?
Yeah okay do that.
The worlds largest Uranium deposit is Australia, not to mention the best coal and iron.

Politicians are retarded and know nothing of science, they would be too afraid to nuke Australia (not to mention Australia doesn't own any nuclear weapons so it's completely off the field to nuke us) pollys would be afraid of igniting all the Uranium under Australia, then boom no more Earth.

Trump ain't a war monger, he's a business man, who wants to see American jobs returned to American people, while boosting the economy and putting the Citizens of USA above any immigrants and refugees.

Burnie is an old fart who sounds like Anita Sarkeesian half the time, saying shit like "white people don't know poverty". The only people (if you can even call a SJW "people" or "human") supporting him are lazy idiots who can't get off their arse and put their life together themselves.
I don't care, But if Obama is out of the seat can we have him ;-;

jfc the oce boards are filled with downvote happy leftist shitheads and ledditors.
fuck i hate this place now. literally a garbage forum, and its only going to get worse.

It's literally a forum for the game at hand and nothing else.
To compound to topic at hand being not applicable to these particular boards, these are the Oceanic ones, so American politics are even less valued and relevant here.

You want to talk politics? Go to either a political forum or an open topic forum like Reddit and talk about it there.
